refnamediv.refpurpose: generate sets of words Tesseract is likely to find ambiguous

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.simpara: ambiguous_words(1) runs Tesseract in a special mode, and for each word in word list, produces a set of words which Tesseract thinks might be ambiguous with it. TESSDATADIR must be set to the absolute path of a directory containing tessdata/lang.traineddata.
